title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1486/89 of 30 May 1989 reducing the basic and buying-in prices for nectarines for the 1989 marketing year following the overrun of the guarantee threshold
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1486/89
of 30 May 1989
reducing the basic and buying-in prices for nectarines for the 1989 marketing year following the overrun of the guarantee threshold
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The basic and buying-in prices fixed for nectarines for 1989 by Regulation (EEC) No 1120/89 shall be reduced by 20 % to the following:
(ECU/100 kg net)
1.2,3 //  //  // Period  // From 1 June to 31 August  // 1.2.3 //  // Basic price   // Buying-in price   //    //  //   // June   // 47,92   // 23,00   // July and August  // 43,54   // 20,90   //    //   //
These prices refer to nectarines of the varieties Armking, Crimsongold, Early Sun Grand, Fantasia, Independence, May Grand, Nectared, Snow Queen and Starkredgold, quality class I, size 61 to 67 millimetres, presented packed. They take no account of the cost of the packaging.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 May 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 118, 20. 5. 1972, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 118, 29. 4. 1989, p. 12.
(3) OJ No L 129, 25. 5. 1988, p. 13.
(4) OJ No L 118, 29. 4. 1989, p. 14.
